lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re ''Network Coverage a Target of Fire From Conservatives'' (news article, Nov. 7): Comprehensive and unbiased coverage has never been more essential than now. While nothing justifies or excuses the horrific events of Sept. 11, a full and honest analysis of the role of American global capitalism would help us to begin to comprehend the mentality of the perpetrators and the nature of the threat.
abstract: Nancy Lowenthal letter on Nov 7 article cites need for comprehensive and unbiased television network news coverage of war on terrorism in Afghanistan
